# transactionObservers

**Instance Property**

An array of all active payment queue observers.

## Declaration

```swift
var transactionObservers: [any SKPaymentTransactionObserver] { get }
```

## Adding, Getting, and Removing Observers

- **add(_:)**: Adds an observer to the payment queue.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes an observer from the payment queue.

items.description: Adds an observer to the payment queue.
items.name: add(_:)

items.description: Removes an observer from the payment queue.
